analysis.description:
WorldCupEther.teamsAreInitiated (/unique_chucks/10/0xec61ae640fba61c7de9d500c0776d3f6567d4ad4.sol#20-21) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- InitiateTeams (/unique_chucks/10/0xec61ae640fba61c7de9d500c0776d3f6567d4ad4.sol#119-153)

WorldCupEther.ceoAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/10/0xec61ae640fba61c7de9d500c0776d3f6567d4ad4.sol#5-6)
WorldCupEther.cfoAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/10/0xec61ae640fba61c7de9d500c0776d3f6567d4ad4.sol#6-8)
WorldCupEther.teamsAreInitiated should be constant (/unique_chucks/10/0xec61ae640fba61c7de9d500c0776d3f6567d4ad4.sol#20-21)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/10/0xec61ae640fba61c7de9d500c0776d3f6567d4ad4.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/10/0xec61ae640fba61c7de9d500c0776d3f6567d4ad4.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_countryId' of WorldCupEther.purchaseCountry (/unique_chucks/10/0xec61ae640fba61c7de9d500c0776d3f6567d4ad4.sol#42) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_teamId' of WorldCupEther.modifyPriceCountry (/unique_chucks/10/0xec61ae640fba61c7de9d500c0776d3f6567d4ad4.sol#65-66) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_newPrice' of WorldCupEther.modifyPriceCountry (/unique_chucks/10/0xec61ae640fba61c7de9d500c0776d3f6567d4ad4.sol#66) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_teamId' of WorldCupEther.getTeam (/unique_chucks/10/0xec61ae640fba61c7de9d500c0776d3f6567d4ad4.sol#74) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_teamId' of WorldCupEther.getTeamPrice (/unique_chucks/10/0xec61ae640fba61c7de9d500c0776d3f6567d4ad4.sol#86-88) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_teamId' of WorldCupEther.getTeamOwner (/unique_chucks/10/0xec61ae640fba61c7de9d500c0776d3f6567d4ad4.sol#91-94) is not in mixedCase
